ComicInfo.Summary: Sara has a dream about a previous bearer of the Witchblade. She has a chat with Eric about the Witchblade and discovers he has a mystic weapon of his own. Julie tells Jake that she is moving to California. Sara attends Anya's wake to try and get more intel on her relationship with Irons but finds Ian beating on an old man (it's Dr. Nolan). Level 42 obtains the fear killer, Bijak. New York gets a new D.A. who swears to clean up crime, starting with the mob.
ComicInfo.Tags: Witchblade,Sara Pezzini,Jake McCarthy,Eric Sketh,Julie Pezzini,Ian Nottingham,Kenneth Irons,New York State,New York City,Doctor Nolin
